issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Fix dead links to the javadocs of o.a.h.security.authorize

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1) open hadoop-2.7.1\share\doc\hadoop\api\index.html
2) Click on "All Classes"
3) Click on "AccessControlList", The page shows "This page canâ€™t be displayed"
Same error for DistCp, ImpersonationProvider and DefaultImpersonationProvider also.

Javadoc generated from Trunk has the same problem
fields.summary: Hadoop javadoc has broken links for AccessControlList, ImpersonationProvider, DefaultImpersonationProvider, and DistCp

This message was automatically generated.
[~arshad.mohammad],  FYI, you should use target-version for your intention. Fix-version is set at commit time. I'm fixing this for now.
Moving out all non-critical / non-blocker issues that didn't make it out of 2.7.2 into 2.7.3. Please revert back if you disagree.
LGTM, +1. Thanks [~arshad.mohammad].

Cancelling my +1. Would you remove {{@Public}} from hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/package-info.java and add {{@Public}} to hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/package-info.java? Since DistCp is in hadoop-distcp package, it's better to add the annotation there.
Thanks [~ajisakaa] for your review comment. Added {{@Public}} to {{hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/package-info.java}}. Submitted HADOOP-12545-02.patch
